attributes.additional_details:
Under-Secretary of State Penny Mordaunt made a mockery of Parliament with her infamous "c**k" speech allegedly made for a bet.

I am disgusted that a Government Minister finds the time to write and give spoof speeches whilst some UK citizens are struggling with much more serious matters - feeding their children and heating their homes.

Another example of a privileged, out-of-touch politician. The Prime Minister must sack her.
